alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 02 at 2:36AM EST until January 03 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Sustained winds of 20 to 29 mph with gusts up to 36 mph. South to southwest winds are forecast during the evening and will shift to the west and northwest around midnight. * WHERE...Coastal Wakulla, Jefferson, Taylor, and Dixie counties. * WHEN...7PM EST to 7AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained winds of 26 to 39 mph are expected for at least 2 hours, or gusts between 40 to 57 mph for any length of time are possible. Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla
